DOC.brief_summary: Randomized placebo-controlled crossover study participant undergo two different experimental day . The participant consume red grape based- drink ( polyphenols : 300 mg/100 ml sugar : 9.8g/100 ml ) placebo ( polyphenols sugar : 9.8g/100 ml ) . After 3 hour consume test meal ( 905 kcal , 15 % protein , 46 % fat , 39 % CHO ) . Blood sample take fasting , 3 hour drink consumption 5 hour test meal evaluate metabolic response . Fasting 48h-urine collected evaluate bioavailability .
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Polyphenols Contained Red Grape Extract-based Drink Their Metabolic Effects
DOC.criteria: BMI > 25 < 35 kg/m2 Total cholesterol < 250 mg/dl Triglyceride < 200 mg/dl . Fasting glucose < 100 mg/dl Cardiovascular event ( IMA stroke ) 6 month prior study Kidney liver failure Anemia ( Hb < 12 g/dl ) Any chronic disease Intense physical activity Dietary supplement
